Headline: No Trains Between Wilson and Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Wilson and Belmont due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Wilson and Belmont due to a track condition.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Wilson, and,
  • between Belmont and 95th, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Wilson and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th St./Racine
ShortDescription: EB 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via: 69th, Racine, 71st, Halsted and 69th. due to, street blockage, near 69th St./Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via: 69th, Racine, 71st, Halsted and 69th. due to, street blockage, near 69th St./Racine.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
